headline: Leadership Changes At Xcel Energy (NasdaqGS:XEL) As Tim O'Connor Announces Retirement In 2025
summary: Xcel Energy (NasdaqGS:XEL) recently announced significant executive changes with the retirement of COO Timothy O’Connor and key appointments including Scott Sharp and Michael Lamb. These leadership shifts, alongside a quarterly dividend increase to $0.57 per share, have appeared concurrent with the company's positive price move of 7% over the past month. Furthermore, Xcel Energy's financial health was bolstered by its strong fourth-quarter earnings, showing a net income increase to $464...
